02696 QStringList MainWindow::SQL_getPrefixAndDirInfo(QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem){
02697     /*
02698     This function, gets prefix_id and dir_id info
02699     This pice of code repeats some times, so i decided to place it in embeded function
02700 
02701     @treeItem -- this is start item for discovery...
02702 
02703     It returns QStringList size of some elements;
02704 
02705     0 : prefix_id
02706     1 : prefix_path
02707     2 : wine_dllpath
02708     3 : wine_loader
02709     4 : wine_server
02710     5 : wine_exec
02711     6 : dir_id
02712 
02713     Or 0 : '-1' at error;
02714     */
02715 
02716     QSqlQuery query;
02717     QStringList dataList;
02718 
02719     if (treeItem->parent()){
02720         query.prepare("select id, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_server, wine_exec from prefix where name=:name");
02721         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02722         if (!query.exec()){
02723 #ifdef DEBUG
02724             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02725 #endif
02726             dataList    << "-1";
02727             return dataList;
02728         }
02729         query.first();
02730         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
02731         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
02732         dataList << query.value(2).toString();
02733         dataList << query.value(3).toString();
02734         dataList << query.value(4).toString();
02735         dataList << query.value(5).toString();
02736         query.clear();
02737 
02738         query.prepare("select id from dir where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id");
02739         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
02740         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
02741         if (!query.exec()){
02742 #ifdef DEBUG
02743             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02744 #endif
02745             return dataList;
02746         }
02747         query.first();
02748         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
02749         query.clear();
02750     } else {
02751         query.prepare("select id, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_server, wine_exec from prefix where name=:name");
02752         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
02753         if (!query.exec()){
02754 #ifdef DEBUG
02755             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02756 #endif
02757             dataList    << "-1";
02758             return dataList;
02759         }
02760         query.first();
02761         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
02762         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
02763         dataList << query.value(2).toString();
02764         dataList << query.value(3).toString();
02765         dataList << query.value(4).toString();
02766         dataList << query.value(5).toString();
02767         dataList << "";
02768         query.clear();
02769     }
02770 
02771     return dataList;
02772 }
02773 
02774 QStringList MainWindow::SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem){
02775     /*
02776         This function, gets prefix_id and dir_id
02777         This pice of code repeats some times, so i decided to place it in embeded function
02778 
02779         @treeItem -- this is start item for discovery...
02780 
02781         It returns QStringList size of 3 elements;
02782 
02783             first : prefix_id
02784             second: prefix_path
02785             third : dir_id
02786 
02787         Or '-1','','-1' at error;
02788     */
02789 
02790     QSqlQuery query;
02791     QStringList dataList;
02792 
02793     if (treeItem->parent()){
02794         query.prepare("select id, path from prefix where name=:name");
02795         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02796         if (!query.exec()){
02797             #ifdef DEBUG
02798                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02799             #endif
02800             dataList    << "-1" << "" << "-1";
02801             return dataList;
02802         }
02803         query.first();
02804         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
02805         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
02806         query.clear();
02807 
02808         query.prepare("select id from dir where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id");
02809         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
02810         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
02811         if (!query.exec()){
02812             #ifdef DEBUG
02813                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02814             #endif
02815             dataList    << "-1" << "" << "-1";
02816             return dataList;
02817         }
02818         query.first();
02819         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
02820         query.clear();
02821     } else {
02822         query.prepare("select id, path from prefix where name=:name");
02823         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
02824         if (!query.exec()){
02825             #ifdef DEBUG
02826                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02827             #endif
02828             dataList    << "-1" << "" << "-1";
02829             return dataList;
02830         }
02831         query.first();
02832         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
02833         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
02834         dataList << "";
02835         query.clear();
02836     }
02837 
02838     return dataList;
02839 }
02840 
02841 bool MainWindow::SQL_isIconExistsByName(QString prefix_id, QString dir_id, QString name){
02842     QSqlQuery query;
02843 
02844     if(dir_id.isEmpty()){
02845         query.prepare("select id from icon where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL");
02846     }else{
02847         query.prepare("select id from icon where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
02848         query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
02849     }
02850     query.bindValue(":name", name);
02851     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02852 
02853     if (!query.exec()){
02854         #ifdef DEBUG
02855             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at MainWindow::iconPaste_Click(void)\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02856         #endif
02857         return FALSE;
02858     }
02859     query.first();
02860 
02861     if (query.isValid ()){
02862         query.clear();
02863         return TRUE;
02864     }
02865     query.clear();
02866 
02867     return FALSE;
02868 }
02869 
02870 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_ImageMount(QString image, QString mount){
02871     /*
02872         Mounting an image or drive to mountmount
02873             @image -- an image (or drive) name
02874             @mount -- mount point
02875     */
02876 
02877 
02878     //mount_cd9660
02879 
02880     QStringList args;
02881     QString arg;
02882 
02883     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
02884 
02885 
02886         if ((image.right(3)=="iso") or (image.right(3)=="nrg")){
02887             args << SH_BIN;
02888             args << "-c";
02889                 arg = core->getWhichOut("mount_cd9660");
02890                 //FIXME: not tested
02891                 //if (image.right(3)=="nrg")
02892                 //  arg = arg.append(" -s 307200 ");
02893                 arg.append("  /dev/`mdconfig -f ");
02894                 arg.append(image);
02895                 arg.append("` ");
02896                 arg.append(mount);
02897             args << arg;
02898         } else {
02899             args << MOUNT_BIN << "-t" << "cd9660" << image << mount;
02900         }
02901     #endif
02902 
02903     #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
02904         args << MOUNT_BIN;
02905         args << image;
02906         args << mount;
02907 
02908         if (image.right(3)=="iso"){
02909             args << "-o" << "loop";
02910         }
02911         if (image.right(3)=="nrg"){
02912             args << "-o" << "loop,offset=307200";
02913         }
02914 
02915     #endif
02916 
02917         //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
02918         if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
02919            arg=args.join(" ");
02920            args.clear();
02921            args<<arg;
02922         }
02923 
02924         Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Mounting..."), tr("Mounting..."));
02925 
02926         if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
02927             statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Image successfully mounted"));
02928         } else {
02929             statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Image mount fail"));
02930         }
02931 
02932     return;
02933 }
02934 
02935 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_ImageUnmount(QString mount){
02936 
02937     QStringList args;
02938     QString arg;
02939     Process *exportProcess;
02940 
02941     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
02942         args.clear();
02943         args << "-c" << tr("%1 | grep %2").arg(MOUNT_BIN).arg(mount);
02944 
02945         QProcess *myProcess = new QProcess(this);
02946         myProcess->start(SH_BIN, args);
02947         if (!myProcess->waitForFinished()){
02948             qDebug() << "Make failed:" << myProcess->errorString();
02949             return;
02950         }
02951 
02952         QString devid = myProcess->readAll();
02953     #endif
02954 
02955     args.clear();
02956     args << UMOUNT_BIN;
02957     args << mount;
02958 
02959     //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
02960     if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
02961        arg=args.join(" ");
02962        args.clear();
02963        args<<arg;
02964     }
02965 
02966     exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Unmounting..."), tr("Unmounting..."));
02967 
02968     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
02969         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("image successfully unmounted"));
02970     } else {
02971         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("image unmount fail"));
02972     }
02973 
02974     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
02975         if (!devid.isEmpty()){
02976             devid = devid.split(" ").first();
02977             if (!devid.isEmpty()){
02978                 if (devid.contains("md")){
02979                     args.clear();
02980                     args << "mdconfig" <<  "-d" << tr("-u%1").arg(devid.mid(7));
02981 
02982                     //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
02983                     if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
02984                        arg=args.join(" ");
02985                        args.clear();
02986                        args<<arg;
02987                     }
02988 
02989                     exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Unmounting..."), tr("running mdconfig"));
02990 
02991                     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
02992                         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("mdimage removed"));
02993                     } else {
02994                         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("mdimage remove fail"));
02995                     }
02996                 }
02997             }
02998         }
02999     #endif
03000 
03001     return;
03002 }
03003 
03004 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_WineRunAutorunItems(void){
03005 
03006     QSqlQuery query, icoQuery;
03007     QString execcmd, prefixid, runcmd, useconsole, cmdargs, override, winedebug, display, wrkdir, envargs;
03008 
03009     query.exec("select id, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_exec, wine_server from prefix");
03010 
03011     while(query.next()){
03012         icoQuery.prepare("SELECT exec, prefix_id, useconsole, cmdargs, override, winedebug, display, wrkdir FROM icon WHERE dir_id=(SELECT id FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and name=:name)");
03013 
03014         icoQuery.bindValue(":prefix_id", query.value(0).toString());
03015         icoQuery.bindValue(":name", "autostart");
03016 
03017         if (!icoQuery.exec()){
03018             #ifdef DEBUG
03019                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<icoQuery.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<icoQuery.lastError();
03020             #endif
03021             return;
03022         }
03023 
03024         while (icoQuery.next()){
03025             ExecObject execObj;
03026 
03027             execObj.execcmd = icoQuery.value(0).toString();
03028             execObj.prefixid = icoQuery.value(1).toString();
03029             execObj.useconsole = icoQuery.value(2).toString();
03030             execObj.cmdargs = icoQuery.value(3).toString();
03031             execObj.override = icoQuery.value(4).toString();
03032             execObj.winedebug = icoQuery.value(5).toString();
03033             execObj.display = icoQuery.value(6).toString();
03034             execObj.wrkdir = icoQuery.value(7).toString();
03035 
03036             CoreFunction_WinePrepareRunParams(execObj);
03037 
03038         }
03039 
03040         icoQuery.clear();
03041 
03042     }
03043 
03044     query.clear();
03045 
03046     return;
03047 }
